name: Floragram
description:
Write a few words for someone dear to you, without naming them.

End your message by pressing the validation key, and see the vegetation on the island grows ~

Done in 48h-ish during Zoomachines 2016, Floragram was originally playable with a real typewriter.

Made by:

Armel Gibson, Théo Le Du, Maxime Conquy & Delphine Fourneau

Cya
